subject: Re: [junit] Can we have multiple runs for a single test method of the Unit test case
msgSnippet: ... Right now, parallel behavior is expressed in testng.xml, not in Java:   ... So far, nobody has expressed the
messageBody:
On 11/22/05, Eugene Kuleshov <eu@...> wrote:
>
>
> Does TestNG allows to combine several annotations to define particular
> scenario, e.g. multiple threads, N executions each? That is what I loved
> about JUnit 3 suites and decorators...


Right now, parallel behavior is expressed in testng.xml, not in Java:

<test parallel="true" thread-count="5">
<class> ...

So far, nobody has expressed the need to specify this in the source...

--
Cédric


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
